com.alberto.networkmap

Class NetworkMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alberto.networkmap.NetworkMonitor

  • public class NetworkMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the methods to take data which are used to determine the network performance
    Author:
    Alberto García

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      NetworkMonitor(Context context)
      Constructor for the class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CancelMonitoring()
      This method cancels a running monitoring and discard the data already taken
      void StartMonitoring()
      This method starts the monitoring of the download to get data from the network performance
      void StopMonitoring()
      This method stops the running monitoring and sends the data to the alignment module
